goal: Add basic fishing interactions at lake/oasis tiles with tiered success by gear and conditions, plus groundwork for boat/rafts.
decisions: Support bare-hand fishing with low success and a simple `fish` action at lake/oasis biomes; improve odds with a fishing rod item.
Define a small catch table (small fish, big fish, trash, nothing) influenced by time/weather and gear.
Leave boat/raft crafting hooks for later; keep this iteration to shore fishing.
plan: Add fishing action entry point restricted to lake/oasis; implement result weights by gear (hands vs fishing rod) and conditions.
Add catch outcomes (small/big fish items) and basic messages; award modest survival/observation XP.
Run cargo check and update todo tracking; note boat/raft as future work.
notes: Keep it light: no mini-game, just weighted randoms with skill/gear bonuses.
Reuse existing items; add new fish size items only if needed.
progress: Implemented `fish` command with hands/rod weighting, time/weather/skill modifiers, and small/big fish/loot outcomes with XP and durability drains.
Added raft blueprint (logs/cordage) unlocking at survival 20 and a lake/oasis use action for short excursions and small findings.
